title: How to Make Orange Jelly with Kyaut Kyaw Powder

steps.headline: Put Kyaut kyaw powder ("coconut jelly" agar) and sugar into a tray.
steps.description: Then, add a little bit of salt.

steps.headline: Put 3 and half liter of water into the pot that will be using to cook jelly.
Put orange juice into the pot and boil them with average heat.
After the juice is boiled, put Kyauk kyaw powder that is already mixed with sugar and salt into pot.
Boil them about 10 minutes and if the Kyauk kway is sticking onto the spoon as shown in the picture, then stop boiling it.
After that, pour the Kyauk kway into a tray and wait until it becomes cold.
Finally, you can enjoy orange jelly.

text: Put Kyaut kyaw powder ("coconut jelly" agar) and sugar into a tray. Then, add a little bit of salt. Mix them well.  Put 3 and half liter of water into the pot that will be using to cook jelly.  Put orange juice into the pot and boil them with average heat.  After the juice is boiled, put Kyauk kyaw powder that is already mixed with sugar and salt into pot. Stir them well. Boil them about 10 minutes and if the Kyauk kway is sticking onto the spoon as shown in the picture, then stop boiling it.  After that, pour the Kyauk kway into a tray and wait until it becomes cold.  Finally, you can enjoy orange jelly.  Finished.
